Description: First recorded value after requested time
Value recorded at requested time; same as **After** if that doesn't exist
Value recorded at requested time, but same as **Before** if that doesn't exist
**Interpolated** if Point is continuous; **At or Before** if Point is discrete
First recorded value before requested time
Recorded value at time requested; error if none exists at that time
Interpolated value for requested time; previous value if Point is discrete
